concept.title: Manage Adjustments
concept.shortdesc: Manage Adjustments provides you the ability to update payments made to employees, calculate additional taxes due, and report the information.

conbody.p: Adjustments provide you the ability to update payments made to employees, calculate additional taxes due, and report the information.
From the Manage Adjustments page, you can view any pending adjustments or create an adjustment for an employee who does not have any pending checks.

To create an adjustment select Add and the Create Adjustment pop-up window appears. Select one of the following adjustment types:
Create Standard Adjustment – Available to adjust the payroll history for U.S. and Canada. Standard adjustments allow you to adjust multiple employees for a single quarter.
Create Guided Adjustment – Available to update a work location for a U.S. employee. Create a guided adjustment to move and reconcile wages and taxes for a single employee for a year.

Complete the details of the adjustment on the Create Adjustment page. When completed, select the check box for the applicable employee and select Post.For Payment Services customers, once all adjustments and reversals are posted for all payroll changes, select Notify to send a notification to Payment Services. This notification prompts Payment Services to create a case and process any tax filing amendment. Review your adjustment cases from the Customer Success Portal, if needed.
